Corona ’97 吗？

The year has arrived.
A herd of fuckin' ugly red virus.
are rushing from the mainland.
Crime rate has skyrockeded!
The world is ruined!
Therefore, the world called Kouji Tadokoro's doppelganger "Yaju Senpai" for the massacre of the red virus.
Senpai is a killer machine.
Wipe out all of the red corona-virus!

However, in mainland there was a secret project in progress! A project to transform the Bao Zi into an ultimate weapon!
